author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two students were killed and over a dozen others injured in a head-on collision between a school minibus and a truck in Maharashtra’s Yavatmal district on Thursday.

Police said over 20 students of the Macaroon Students Academy, were travelling in the bus when it rammed with a truck carrying coal on the Nandepera bypass road in Wani Taluk.

The victims have been identified as Shraddha Hulke and Gaurav Devurkar, both aged 14.
title: 2 students die in collision
